name: Live on the edge
description:
You're an amateur mountain climber, you climb the same mountain everyday. One day a professional climber challenges you to see who can collect the most flags climbing the mountain. You have one day to climb the mountain and find your best path for the challenge the next day. There are more flags on the more dangerous path so live on the edge and collect as many flags as you can. Be careful not to fall off the mountain if you fall off 4 times it's game over.

Controls:  Drag the climber with the mouse to collect the flags. hit the checkpoints incase you fall of the edge.

This game was made for the Gamejam VimJam 2.
